ProteinName	N-acetylaspartylglutamate synthase A (NAAG synthetase A) (NAAGS) (EC 6.3.2.41) (N-acetylaspartylglutamylglutamate synthase A) (EC 6.3.2.42) (Ribosomal protein S6 modification-like protein A)

Function	Catalyzes the synthesis of N-acetyl-L-aspartyl-L-glutamate (NAAG) and N-acetyl-L-aspartyl-L-glutamyl-L-glutamate.
